full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
National Master Service Offerings (NMSO) for P25 Subscriber Units

#### Reference
PW-__QD-031-28852 – Amendment number 12

#### Publication Information
Released on: November 11, 2022
Tender closing date: April 4, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

#### Contracting Entity
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

#### Procurement Details
* Tenders are invitation open tenders
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### regions Of Opportunity
Delivery is restricted to the following provinces/territories:

* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* British Columbia
* New Brunswick
* Manitoba
* Saskatchewan
* Alberta
* Nova Scotia
* National Capital Region
* Nunavut Territory
* Prince Edward Island
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* Yukon
* Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Northwest Territories

#### Invitation to Submit a Tender
The Government of Canada invites suppliers to submit bids for the National Master Service Offerings (NMSO) for the P25 Subscriber Units. Interested suppliers must submit a complete and fully compliant tender package, including all required documents, in one of Canada’s Official Languages.

#### Delivery
Delivery of the NMSO is expected after the Contract has been awarded. Suppliers must ensure they are capable of fulfilling all delivery commitments.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price. The evaluation team may, at their discretion, conduct a site visit to assess the completeness and accuracy of the bidder’s submission.

#### Supporting Documents
The following documents are available for download from the Canadabuys website:

* Amendment 012
* Questions and responses 44 to 46
* Draft scope of delivery and specifications
* Optional clarification of the scope of delivery
* Annex A – National Radio Subscriber Unit (NRU)

#### Contact Information
For any questions or assistance, please contact:

* Michelle Sparkes
* Phone: (873) 455-1558
* Email: [michelle.sparkes@tpsg
